word:
Consolidation of the Publishing Work. 

     The Lord has presented matters before me that cause me to tremble for the institutions at Battle Creek. He has laid these things before me, and shall I be consistent if I do not seek to repress the spirit in Battle Creek which reaches out for more power, when for years there have not been sufficient men who were qualified to preside, with 
                                                                           1570
Christian faithfulness, over the charge they already have.
